```{r cars}
library(tidyverse)
library(modelr)
h1b_kaggle <- read_csv("h1b_kaggle.csv", col_names=TRUE)
h1b_working <- h1b_kaggle
h1b_filtered<-filter(h1b_working,CASE_STATUS %in% c('CERTIFIED','DENIED'))

summary(h1b_working)

h1b_working %>% filter(!is.na(CASE_STATUS)) %>% group_by(CASE_STATUS) %>% 
  summarise(nr = length(lat)) %>% ungroup() -> dc

ggplot(data = dc, aes(x = reorder(CASE_STATUS,nr), y = nr/1000)) +  
  geom_bar(stat="identity", fill="tomato", colour="black") +
  coord_flip() + theme_bw(base_size = 10)  +
  labs(title="", x ="Case status", y = "Number of applications (thousands)")


```
